alert.note: Alert for Fond Du Lac; Sheboygan (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 12 at 10:58AM CDT until March 13 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Fond du Lac and Sheboygan Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult by this evening. The hazardous conditions should impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This will be a long duration snowfall event and snowfall rates will increase once again by late this evening. This will also be the time of greater travel impacts, which will extend through tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling across this part of Wisconsin. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
